body.name: Crossroads: Christian Suspense (A Holly Novel Book 5)

productInformation.value: #53,391 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #41 in Teen & Young Adult Thrillers & Suspense (Kindle Store) #130 in Teen & Young Adult Thrillers & Suspense (Books) #154 in Contemporary Christian Fiction (Kindle Store)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you on the edge of your seat!
reviews.reviewText: I loved that you don't have to worry about these books having sex scenes or bad language. When these characters have problems they are there for each other. Many of the characters look to the Lord for help. I have read all of CC Warren's books. I have borrowed them from Kindle Unlimited, but after I read them I purchase them I love them so much I want to read them again and again. She is the only one I have done this with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don’t think I could have asked for a better book series
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this series and bought all the books at once!! Best decision ever!!! My two favorite things about this book series is 1) the characters. They are so diverse and so well described that is doesn’t leave me wondering what the character looks like. And all their backstories are so meticulously crafted I can’t even explain how much I enjoy learning about each one of them. It leaves you having a deeper connection and over all appreciation for the character. And 2) is how different each plot and story line is in each book. C.C is full of creativity and you never know what to expect! Please read this series! You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holly Novel review
reviews.reviewText: These are exceptional novels dealing with very real issues. They remind us oh how much our God loves us and will carry us through everything when we believe He can✝️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this story, love Holly! So glad to see her healing and growing. This series has been a whirlwind. I have been on the edge of my seat and reading late into the night since book 1! I hope to see more from this series, but if not it has been awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have read all of CC’s books and especially love the Holly series! The characters are rich and inviting, the books are always intense, never boring!Looking forward to the next book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was a good book, but kind of scary. I had dreams over this book and usually do not read this kind of literature. I got through it and the thought that this is actually happening in our world today really upsets me. People kidnapping children and exploiting them makes me angry and sad. Makes me realize how blessed I am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Great Action, Great Suspense, Great Drama, Great Romance!
reviews.reviewText: When I got this book, I was ready for more of Holly and her gang. I truly feel they have become my friends and I want to know what is happening with them. I love reading about how the relationships between all the characters are developing.This story was full of action and suspense, with some fun relational moments mixed in.I love CC Warrens’ writings. She packs so much into her books and of course, Holly gets into the most interesting (and sometimes life-threatening) situations.In this book, there are some dark moments battling the evils of people mixed up in cults. It shows the strong pull cults can have on a soul.CC Warrens is a gifted author. One of the things I appreciate about her writing is that she’s not afraid to speak the truth. She wove moments of hope and life lessons throughout this book. Lessons like reaching out to God when it feels like things are out of control and out of our hands. God has got it all in His hands and timing. When it feels the darkest, He’s still there with us!If you love books that will keep you spellbound until the very end, then this is one for you!I highly recommend you pick this book up and read it.I was given this book by the publisher which did not influence my review in any way, all thoughts and opinions are my own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you enjoy Christian fiction, this series of which this is the 5th book is a must read. It's not one of those you think you have got figured out after reading only the beginning chapters. I will be watching for a sequel!
